item.title: News Collection: Transboundary air pollution between China and South Korea
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to transboundary air pollution between China and South Korea. Smog becomes a political issue in South Korean election, Anna Fifield and Yoonjung Seo, The Washington Post, Apr/27/2017, link . South Korea smothered in Chinese air pollution, Wooyoung Lee, UPI, Nov/27/2018, link . What are the main causes of air pollution in South Korea? IQAir, link . Chinese Yellow Dust or Korean Factory Fumes?

item.title: News Collection: Climate and Environment
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to climate and the environment, which I am interested in. Worries in the Path of China’s Air, NYT, Dec/25/2013, link . Where My Climate Doubts Began to Melt, NYT, Oct/28/2022, link . Global Warming /& Extreme Heat Climate Risks Loom Over Panama Canal, a Vital Global Trade Link, NYT, Aug/25/2023, link . 1. Lack of rain and changing weather patterns are slowing the ship traffic that moves goods around the world.

item.title: News Collection:
item.description: This is a collection of newspaper articles related to transboundary air pollution between China and South Korea. Stunned by Floods, China Hastens Logging Curbs, NYT, Sep/27/1998, link . China Said to Fuel Illegal Trade in Timber, NYT, Nov/29/2012, link . China’s Demand Threatens Rare Hardwoods in Mekong, NYT, link . China’s Voracious Appetite for Timber Stokes Fury in Russia and Beyond, APR/9/2019, link . Despite Global Pledges, Tree Loss Is Up Sharply in Tropical Forests, NYT, Jun/27/2023, link .
